name: HTML
description: I have good HTML skills, which serve as the foundation of web development. I can create well-structured and standards-compliant websites.

name: CSS
description: I have good CSS skills, which are essential for styling and laying out websites. I can create visually appealing, responsive, and well-structured designs.

name: JavaScript
description: I have a good understanding of JavaScript, especially in front-end development. I am capable of using JavaScript to create interactive and dynamic websites, enhancing the user experience.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: I have a good understanding of Tailwind CSS, a utility-first framework for fast and efficient web design. I can use it to create responsive and customizable designs with minimal effort.

name: Figma
description: I have experience using Figma for designing wireframes, prototypes, and user interfaces. This gives me a strong understanding of UI/UX principles.

name: Git & GitHub
description: I have experience using Git and GitHub to manage project versions and collaborate with other developers. This ensures code integrity and efficient teamwork.

name: Laravel
description: I have basic experience with Laravel, a popular PHP framework, which I've used to build web applications. I can work with routes, controllers, and models to create scalable systems.

name: MySQL
description: I have a basic understanding of MySQL, and I've applied it to create projects using phpMyAdmin. I'm familiar with creating and managing databases, and writing queries.

name: Java
description: I have a basic understanding of Java, which I use for back-end development with frameworks like Spring. I've learned core concepts such as object-oriented programming (OOP) and functions.

name: Spring
description: I have basic experience with the Spring framework, a powerful Java framework. I can use it to build robust and scalable back-end applications.

name: TypeScript
description: I have a basic understanding of TypeScript, a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing to the language. It helps me write more robust and maintainable code.

name: Supabase
description: I have a basic understanding of Supabase. I can use it as a back-end as a service (BaaS) for projects that need real-time database, authentication, and file storage.

name: Firebase
description: I have a basic understanding of Firebase. I can use it as a back-end as a service (BaaS) for projects that need real-time database, authentication, and file storage from Google.

name: React
description: I have a good understanding of React, which I use to build user interfaces and single-page applications. My knowledge allows me to create dynamic and efficient front-end experiences.

name: Next.js
description: I have a basic understanding of Next.js, a React framework. I can use it to build performant and scalable web applications with server-side rendering.

name: PostgreSQL
description: I have a basic understanding of PostgreSQL, a powerful open-source relational database. I'm familiar with creating and managing databases for various applications.
